## Beispielhafter ggplot-code und plot

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| fig-align: center
#| output-location: slide # Option for location of output (next slide)
#| code-line-numbers: "1-3|4-6|7-9" # Highlights lines of code

ggplot(data = mtcars, aes(x = hp, y = mpg, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  labs(
    title = "PS vs. Verbrauch",
    x = "Horsepower (hp)",
    y = "Miles per Gallon (mpg)",
    color = "Zylinder"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
